name: 12 Month Zine Subscription
description:
So all this pre-ordering, waiting and buying our zine each month can sure be a pain right? 

If only there was an easier way to get the MM monthly mag delivered hassle-free without worry. That’s why, we're starting a Musical Mathematics subscription where, with a single one-off payment, readers will receive a year’s worth of zines (12 issues), one sent every month without trouble. 

1 year subscription (12 issues) is £20 (Plus some exclusive MM subscription Goodies)

Subscription INCLUDES this months Zine

Subscribers will also have a 'Priority' status and will receive discounts, exclusives and previews. 

Sign up now!!

(Order outside of the UK will be Â£2 extra for postage reasons)
